books

Class Printed

  • java.lang.Object
    • books.Book
      • books.Printed
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Borrow, ReadInLibrary

    public class Printed
extends Book
implements ReadInLibrary, Borrow

      Constructs a Printed Book object with given Book Id as parameter.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Printed

        public Printed(int bookID)
        Constructs a Printed Book object with given Book Id as parameter. It calls its superior constructor with 2 parameter which are BookID and BookType.
        Parameters:
        bookID - The Book Id value which will be assigned to this Book object.

    • Method Detail

      • getDeadLine

        public int getDeadLine()
        Returns deadLine value of this Book.
        Returns:
        deadLine fields value.

      • isExtended

        public boolean isExtended()
        Returns whether the book is extended before or not
        Returns:
        true if isExtended true, otherwise false.

      • returnBook

        public void returnBook(LibraryMember member)
        Implement action of returning a book which has taken to read in library or borrowed. Reassigns the values of the relevant fields value which are isTaken, whoHas, isRead and deadLine. Calls decrementNumberOfBooks method to decrease the number of the books which are taken by member.
        Specified by:
        returnBook in class Book
        Parameters:
        member - The member who want to return this book to the library.
        See Also:
        Book.returnBook(librarymembers.LibraryMember)

      • borrowBook

        public void borrowBook(LibraryMember member,
                       int tick)
        Implements the action of borrowing this Printed book from the library. Assign the values of the relevant fields value regarding to borrowing action. which are isTaken, whoHas, deadLine fields. Calculates the deadLine of this book with the helps of tick parameter and getTimeLimit method; and assign this value to deadLine field. Calls addHistory method to add this book to history of the member who want to read the book. Calls incrementNumberOfBooks method to increase the number of the books which are taken by the member.
        Specified by:
        borrowBook in interface Borrow
        Parameters:
        member - The member who want to borrow this book from the library.
        tick - The actual time indicator.
        See Also:
        Borrow.borrowBook(librarymembers.LibraryMember, int)

      • extend

        public void extend(LibraryMember member,
                   int tick)
        Implements the action of extending this Printed book taken from the library. Assign the values of the relevant fields value regarding to extending action. which are isExtended and the deadLine fields. Calculates the new deadLine of this book with the helps of tick parameter and getTimeLimit method; and reassign this value to deadLine field.
        Specified by:
        extend in interface Borrow
        Parameters:
        member - The member who want to extend this book.
        tick - The actual time indicator.
        See Also:
        Borrow.extend(librarymembers.LibraryMember, int)

      • readBook

        public void readBook(LibraryMember member)
        Implements the action of reading this Printed book in the library. Assign the values of the relevant fields value regarding to reading action. Changes isTaken, whoHas, isRead fields. Calls addHistory method to add this book to history of the member who want to read the book.
        Specified by:
        readBook in interface ReadInLibrary
        Parameters:
        member - The member who want to read the book.
        See Also:
        ReadInLibrary.readBook(librarymembers.LibraryMember)
